item.description:
Reschedule a previous dinner outing. Reservations have been made for this evening at 7:30. Hoping some of you can join me even though there's another meetup scheduled for the same night. The food here is quite yummy and they also have a gluten free menu. They also have a special menu for 2 for $29.95 which includes 1 app, 2 entrees, & 1 dessert. Free valet.

If more people are on waitlist by the day of, we can increase the number at the table. Please bring cash to pay for your own meal, we will not split.
item.name: DINNER @ Waterman Grille
